extendedInfo.description: Healowâ¢ lets patients communicate with their doctorâs office and access up to date health records on the app. Your provider can communicate with you directly and you will be able to access your appointment summary, lab results, vitals, manage medications and other personal health data. The app will allow you to link multiple portal accounts and review all your health content under one account. You will also be able to manage your family accounts all under the same app.Healowâ¢ app allows you to:Â· Send and receive secure messages to and from your physicianâs officeÂ· Receive Alerts and Reminders from your physicianâs officeÂ· View and manage your medications.Â· Set reminders to help you remember appointments and scheduled medications.Â· Receive lab results with interpretation from your physicianâs office.Â· Get Visit Summaries for past appointments.Â· Manage multiple eClinicalworks Portal accounts in one app.Â· Link and manage family member accounts in same app.If you face any issues please send us an email at help@healow.com or click on "Email Developer" or "Send Email" link on play store.

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: How do you sign in? Do you have to get the info from Dr\'s office before using this?
reviews.author: Sandy Tuzicka

reviews.title: Can\'t connect to anything ...
reviews.comment: No matter how many times I\'ve tried to leave \"feedback\", connect to find out test results or appointment time all I get is \"Cannot connect you to the portal, please try again later.\" Frustrated to say the least ...
reviews.author: Rachel Cates

reviews.title: Absolute garbage
reviews.comment: Authors beg you to email before writing negative review, but there is no valid email link in Google Apps OR in the author\'s website.  Don\'t bother, folks.  It will NOT make your life easier - just one more nuisance to try to deal with.
reviews.author: Jim Jensen

reviews.title: Great app except for one big problem
reviews.comment: Great app except for one big problem: I can\'t copy anything.   If I want to call the doctor that I am have just received a referral for, I have to memorize the phone number and then dial it into to my phone manually, it won\'t let me just tap on it to launch the phone app. If I open a message from my doctor that has information I need to share my wife, I have to copy it all down to paper and then back into my phone to email.  If I want to save a list of my medications into Evernote... Disappointing.
reviews.author: Tex Mitchell

reviews.title: Wish i could use it
reviews.comment: Cant find my doctors practice, no matter what way I search. And how do you use this on a regular desktop or laptop computer? Very confusing..very frustrating...not a happy person.
reviews.author: Sheryl Dreher

reviews.title: Can\'t type in password
reviews.comment: I was excited to see this app but was unable to enter my password. I am forced to uninstall.
reviews.author: Keri Ferreira

reviews.title: Good and Works
reviews.comment: I\'m able to see all the things needed, request an appointment and various other things. Also I can access from the web. So far, a really good app.  The only problem I had was knowing my log in which took all of 5 minutes to figure out and log in. I can see the potential and a few tweaks to the app to make it even better.
reviews.author: K McCall

reviews.title: Can\'t unlock app
reviews.comment: Locks up during initial pin selection to unlock app. Message to try again later but app is frozen on that screen (even after clearing the cache).
reviews.author: Sue Sullivan

reviews.title: Bugs, bugs, bugs
reviews.comment: Takes forever to load,  sometimes won\'t. Won\'t save any editing, like adding your meds. Logged in only to have it say, no published reports! Then it decides to load the page. Fix please!
reviews.author: Lorraine Pounds

reviews.comment: Extreme waste of time useless a government worker must have created this app
reviews.author: Paige Cane

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Can\'t access parts in my results area and the basics aren\'t showing up
reviews.author: Kristin M

reviews.title: Works good
reviews.comment: Labs on standard form open OK. Reports requiring written readings or diagnosis don\'t open or are blank. Maybe need to be linked to external program. Ex. X-ray report got message to try again after some time. Don\'t know if its just me or it can\'t format the report. I can open on PC. Everything else works good
reviews.author: Stewart Price

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Wish I could see my username. Can\'t recall what it is to get on the regular computer. Can\'t request appointments or edit any of the listed profile info (neds, ht, wt, etc). Cool to see results of tests before your visit.
reviews.author: Kat Palma

reviews.title: So much for update
reviews.comment: Wont give me option to link info
reviews.author: Christopher Heath

reviews.comment: Awesome Idea!
reviews.author: Kristy Pehanich

reviews.comment: Works great.
reviews.author: Matt Hall

reviews.title: Help..
reviews.comment: Can\'t link more than one account..
reviews.author: Heather Blanchard

reviews.title: Don\'t like it.
reviews.comment: It freezes up and won\'t let me in! Not worth the aggravation!
reviews.author: VeRita Quinn

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Wonderful app to stay in contact with Dr.
reviews.author: Susan Crement

reviews.title: No more missed doctors calls
reviews.comment: Easy to use app, health history at my fingertips, written doctor summary....love it
reviews.author: Tara Golden
